0.0.0.name: wordpress/flickr-on-steroids
0.0.0.description:
You can select the images from Flickr which you would like to include in a gallery. After you publish the post a gallery consisting of thumbnails appears in it. When you click a thumbnail a full-size image appears in a popup window.

Very flexible and easy to use!
